long_description: This lightweight and unbreakable signal mirror from Coghlan's fits easily in your survival kit or your back pocket. Made of strong acrylic material, this mirror won't break or give you seven years bad luck. Hole at top of mirror allows you to attach string or lanyard and wear around your neck for emergency situations or hang from a tree while you primp.
short_description: This lightweight and unbreakable signal mirror from Coghlan's fits easily in your survival kit or your back pocket.
